title: Automated Tutoring-Based Intensive Short-Term Reading Strategy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of an interactive learning environment in smartphone-centric limited-tech settings. Provides personalized tutoring accounting for reading ability differences

learning_goals: Learners can apply text analysis strategies (e.g., key sentence extraction, inferential question generation) with 80% accuracy using an automated tutoring system
Learners can revise reading strategies according to feedback provided in interactive learning environments and improve final learning outcomes by 25%
Learners achieve 70% or higher comprehension across various text types (explanatory, argumentative) based on system-recommended strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
